title: New: How To Dress Well – Cold Nites
body:
Still my most anticipated release of 2012, **How To Dress Well’s** _**Total Loss**_ could well have the effect that **Bon Iver’s** sophomore record had for Vernon & Co, propelling him to worldwide fame.

New cut _Cold Nites_ is a majestically beautiful track, heading towards his R&B roots sprinkled with his own untouchable aurora. Check it out below, and pre-order _**Total Loss**_ [here](http://www.youtube.com/redirect?q=http%3A%2F%2Facephale.bigcartel.com%2F&session_token=JLbrdgO5-3I1FHJgQgpP5N1ceGZ8MTM0MjY0NDAyOUAxMzQyNTU3NjI5) released 17 September..
